item.description:
Hi Ladies,

I've got a week off at the end of April and I was thinking Charleston, SC would be a great destination: Old Plantations, spring gardens, Civil War sights, downtown shopping and arts, good food....

I was thinking of flying out on Saturday, April 24 and returning Thursday, April 29.

Let me know if you're interested in joining me.

Happy Travels,
Jan

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: April Vacation Anyone?
